 Mustex wanted to run after him,but the baby was crying for energon
(not to mention he had to find a way to coax him into beast mode,so 
all he could do was yell.
Mustex:I'LL GET YOU! IF IT TAKES ME TWO LIFETIMES I'LL GET YOU!
 Then somthing occurred to Mustex, he could have 2 lifetimes to hunt 
down Megaton. He walked over and looked in the babies eyes.
Mustex:Computer download and Dormant all datatracks to activate upon 
my detruction. Override activation code..
 Mustex had to think about this...
Mustex:Trump Card!
 The download commenced. It was scary. He knew what happened when a 
transmetal contained 2 sparks, but he didn't have a clue what might 
happen if a nontransmetal contained a powerful merged spark, but 
somehow he seemed to sense great courage from the child...and knew he 
would agree with this step.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
>  Megaton threw Mustex off his back,but quickly realized he was in 
no 
> condition to take on Megatron, or Mustex. He also realized that if 
he 
> returned to his own time for repairs the trans-warp celll that 
> brought him here would not have enough power for him to return. So 
he 
> made the only possible choice and ran. He now had 2 enemies in his 
> own time he would have to go after. Mustex(and his son),and 
Megatron 
> would both someday feel his wrath, but for now he needed to be 
> repaired.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> >  Mustex couldn't believe he had been so stupid(or that he had 
> gotten 
> > this far without any complaints). With his sword spinning he 
jumped 
> > on his opponents back, stabbing the blade savagely into his back.

> > > of

universe.

He

charged.

> > > to

> > > > if 
> > > > > it 
> > > > > > > went through the same gradual upgrades as humans. He

> > > > > allow

the

> > > > > > energy

> > > > > > > > reveal one oddity though. A thin layer of berries, 
sap, 
> > and 
> > > > mud

were

> > > > > > > hour ago

two

> > > > > > weren't 
> > > > > > > far
> > > > > > > > away. The beast transformed to his T-Rex form and 
went

> > > of

> > > > > > tail

> > > > > > > > the family situation killing the mother (leaving the 
> baby 
> > > and 
> > > > > > > fathers DNA to
> > > > > > > > be replicated.) After the two creatures ran away he 
> > > continued 
> > > > > to 
> > > > > > > the pod
> > > > > > > > where he saw Stallex and Mustex, they weren't bots he
